related_questions.question:
⬇QUIZ⬇

Sebutkan rumus simple last tense ! 

No ngasal​

answers.answer:
Verbal

  • (+) S + Verb₂ + o/c
  • (-) S + did not/didn’t + +Verb₁ + o/c
  • (?) Did + S + Verb₁ + o/c ?

Nominal

  • (+) S + to be (was/were) + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (-) S + to be (was/were) + not + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (?) To be (was/were) + S + Adj/Adv/Noun

Pembahasan

Simple past tense adalah sebuah kata kerja yang digunakan untuk berbicara tentang aktivitas masa lalu. Simple Past sendiri biasanya menggunakan past verb/verb 2. Keterangan waktu yang biasa digunakan yaitu last week, last night, last month, last year, yesterday dsb.

Contoh kalimat

Verbal

  • (+) She went to Jakarta yesterday
  • (-) She didn't go to Jakarta yesterday
  • (?) Did she go to Jakarta yesterday?

Nominal

  • (+) You were a student last year
  • (-) You were not a student last year
  • (?) Were you a student last year?

Pelajari lebih lanjut

  • 1.rumus simpel past tense dan berikan 3 contoh kalitugas: brainly.co.id/tugas/29713480
  • berikan 15 contoh simple past tense beserta positif, negatif dan interogatif ?? : brainly.co.id/tugas/14440709
  • buatlah 5 kalimat past tense (+) (-) (?) : brainly.co.id/tugas/24486587

Detail jawaban

Kelas : 8

Mapel : Bahasa Inggris

Materi : Chapter 9 — Past tense

Kode Mapel : 5

Kode Kategorisasi : 8.5.9

related_questions.question:
38. A part of songs which tells the story is called..    A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda

39. A part of songs which is also called as tail is.. 
A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda

40.A part songs which usually repeated in a song is... 
A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda



Bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

38.C. Verse

Penjelasan=A verse is a repeated section of a song that typically features a new set of lyrics on each repetition. ... And while choruses typically contain a song's signature musical motif, the music of a verse is often written to complement the chorus music.

39.D. Coda

penjelasan=Coda is an Italian word for "tail," it is the additional lines of a song which brings it to a close. The coda is an optional addition to a song.

40.A. Chorus

penjelasan=When a distinction is made, the chorus is the part that contains the hook or the "main idea" of a song's lyrics and music, and there is rarely variation from one repetition of the chorus to the next
